fields.name: published
fields.label: Published
fields.description: Toggle off to save as draft (won't appear on the site)

fields.name: heroImage
fields.label: Hero Image
fields.description: Main image at the top of the case study

fields.name: client
fields.label: Client Name (short)
fields.description: Short client name for preview cards (e.g., 'Gerresheimer'). Should match existing proof items if replacing them.

fields.name: clientFull
fields.label: Client Name (full)
fields.description: Full client description shown on case study page (e.g., 'Gerresheimer AG (â‚¬2B+ revenue, 10,000+ employees)')

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo Overlay (optional)
fields.description: SVG or image logo to display on the bottom-left of images

fields.name: title
fields.label: Card Title
fields.description: Short title for the card (e.g., the main result)

fields.name: slug
fields.label: Link to Case Study (optional)
fields.description: Enter the slug of a case study to make this card link to it (e.g., 'gerresheimer-innovation')

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
